game.name: Safe House
game.shortDescription: It’s the end of times. Zombies roam the streets, and you’re trapped in your safe house. Manage resources, venture outside, fight off attacks, and survive until the military arrives.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It’s the end of times. Zombies roam the streets, and you’re trapped in your safe house. Manage resources, venture outside, fight off attacks, and survive until the military arrives.
